definition.text: Defining shortcuts to particular nodes may be useful when interacting with the said node regularly.

paragraphs.text: It is also possible to set a custom shortcut to any node you would like. This is useful for accessing frequenty used nodes.
You may define this type of shortcut using the following procedure:
Hover the mouse pointer over the target node until the menu opens up. This puts the node in focus.
Click Ctrl or Cmd + Alt + your preferred key to assign the shortcut.
A sign will appear below the node confirming the assignation of the shortcut.
Repeat the same procedure to remove a shortcut.

When attempting to assign a shortcut with a keyboard combination that is already in use, the system will notify of the issue. If you insist by hitting the same keyboard combination two more times, the system will assign the shortcut as expected.
